programme.desc: Reba discovers that her daughter's obstetrician will also be delivering the baby of her ex-husband's mistress.

programme.desc: Dorothy hocks an expensive ring to pay off the debt she and her ex-husband owe to the Internal Revenue Service.

programme.desc: Rose decides to move in with Buddy Rourke, one of her deceased husband's former buddies.

programme.desc: As she bounces between temporary jobs, an optimistic woman and her jaded neighbor discover the beauty of New York City together.

programme.desc: When an actor (Luke Perry) who makes Westerns visits a Montana dude ranch, a woman (Emmanuelle Vaugier) realizes that he's actually a city slicker who knows nothing about being a cowboy.

programme.desc: Katherine, an ad executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her. When she wakes up the next morning, she realizes she's reliving the day until she finds the right man.

programme.title: Right in Front of Me
programme.desc: A woman gets a second chance at romance with her college crush but isn't sure how to impress him until her new male friend gives her advice.

programme.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries
programme.desc: Just days before Aurora's wedding, a body is discovered, and she fears her father may be a suspect; she and Nick race to solve the cold case before they walk down the aisle.
